profile.profileDescription: Implements a standard collections management system for the Association of Nova Scotia Museums consortium.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Description narrative pour l'ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public de l'élément.

label.name: Introduktion
label.description: Berättande beskrivning, för gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Description de l'objet
label.description: Description narrative pour un élément de cet ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public d'un élément dans le contexte de cet ensemble.

label.name: Post beskrivning
label.description: Berättande beskrivning för poster i denna gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när poster i grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Type de présentation
label.description: Détermine comment l'ensemble est affiché dans le catalogue public Pawtucket/Pawtucket2.

label.name: Presentation typ
label.description: Bestämmer hur gruppering återges när den visas för allmänheten i Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Est l'item principal de l'ensemble ?
label.description: L'item marqué comme principal sera utilisé pour représenter l'ensemble comme un tout dans l'affichage d'une liste d'ensembles.

label.name: Är det primära objektet för gruppering?
label.description: Objekt markerad som primär kommer att användas för att representera grupperingen i sin helhet när det ingår i en lista över grupperingar.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Code de période
label.description: Code d'une plage de dates à utiliser lorsque les items sont affichés en ordre chronologique.

label.name: Kronologi elementkod
label.description: Elementkoden för datumintervall element som användas för att placera in föremål i kronologisk ordning.

label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.description: La date à laquelle le prêt a été autorisé.

label.name: Datum för godkännande
label.description: Det datum då lånet beviljades.

label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Utlåningsdatum
label.description: Datumet ett lån kommer till institutionen.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.description: The date to apply for a renewal to the loan.

label.name: Lån förnyelse ansökningsdag
label.description: Datumet att ansöka om förnyelse för lånet.

label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.description: En redogörelse för villkoren på ett lån.

label.name: Loan note
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Note sur le prêt
label.description: Informations générales sur le prêt.

label.name: Lån anteckning
label.description: Allmän information om lånet.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Proposition de prêt
label.description: Information générale sur la proposition de prêt.

label.name: Lån syfte

label.description: The method used in the movement of an object.

label.name: Movement method
label.description: The method used in the movement of an object.

label.name: Méthode de mouvement
label.description: La méthode utilisée pour le mouvement d'un objet.

label.name: Förflyttningsmetod
label.description: Den metod som används i förflyttningen av ett objekt.

label.name: Movement note
label.description: Additional information about the movement of an object or group of objects.

label.name: Movement note
label.description: Additional information about the movement of an object or group of objects.

label.name: Note de mouvement
label.description: Informations additionnelles à propos du mouvement de l'objet ou d'un groupe d'objets.

label.name: Förflyttning anteckning
label.description: Ytterligare information om förflyttning av ett objekt eller en grupp av objekt.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object is to be removed from its current location.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object is to be removed from its current location.

label.name: Date de retrait prévu
label.description: La date où l'objet doit être retiré de sa localisation actuelle.

label.name: Planerad borttagningsdatum
label.description: Datumet ett objekt ska tas bort från sin nuvarande plats.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object was actually removed from its current location.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object was actually removed from its current location.

label.name: Plage de retrait prévu
label.description: Les dates auxquelles l'objet a été actuellement retiré de sa localisation actuelle.

label.name: Planerat borttagningsdatum
label.description: Datumet ett föremål faktiskt togs bort från dess nuvarande plats.

label.name: Reason for move
label.description: The purpose or reason for the movement of the object or group of objects.

label.name: Reason for move
label.description: The purpose or reason for the movement of the object or group of objects.

label.name: Raison du mouvement
label.description: Le motif ou la raison du mouvement de l'objet ou du groupe d'objets.

label.name: Orsak till flytt
label.description: Syftet eller skäl för förflyttning av objekt eller en grupp av objekt.

label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.name: Inledning
label.description: Berättande beskrivning av turen. Detta är den primära texten som används när turen presenteras.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Location of this stop.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Location of this stop.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Location of this stop.

label.name: Georeferens
label.description: Plats för detta stopp.

label.name: Description
label.description: This field contains descriptive information about the item cited in the Object Name field that does not occur in other fields.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: External links
label.description: A link to websites which provide more information on the item. Web addresses must begin with "http://"

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the locations associated with the item. To look up a location, simply begin typing in the field; the system will begin searching after three letters have been entered.

label.name: Object Type
label.description: This field contains the descriptive modifier of the name listed in the Object Name field. Examples: mini

label.name: Object Sub-Type
label.description: This field contains the secondary descriptive modifier of the object. Examples: rapid-fire

label.name: Title
label.description: For Artifacts: Contains the title of the item cited in the Object Name field. For fine art, the curatorial title is based on that assigned by the artist. For Archival Items: Transcribe the title as it appears on the document. If there is no title, create a one based on the format of the document (ex: letter or diary) and the name of the creator.

label.name: Category
label.description: This drop-down menu indicates the Category and Sub-Category of the item cited in the Object Name field, as defined in Nomenclature 3.0 for Museum Cataloguing. Initial letters may be typed while the menu is open for faster navigation. You need only select the most detailed level of category, e.g. "Door and Window Element."

label.name: Date
label.description: For artifacts, this field indicates the chronological date range for the item cited in the Object Name field. For archival items, enter the date of creation or possible chronological range. Eg. 1950 - 1954; June 1982; 6/5/2010.

label.name: Group
label.description: Holds data from the old Passage system. For new associations of objects, use collections or sets.

label.name: Military Unit
label.description: This field contains the full name of the unit that used the object. A unit, the lowest level in a military organization , is self-accounting and has a commanding officer. Examples include a battalion, regiment, ship squadron, independent company, air movement unit or battery.

label.name: Vessel Name
label.description: This field contains the name of the vessel associated with the object. The preferred format is the vessel or ship name, followed by the standard abbreviation for the type of vessel; separate the two by a comma.

label.name: Culture
label.description: This field indicates the cultural association of the item cited in the Object Name field , based on its social/geographical origin.

label.name: Measurements
label.description: Records the physical measurements of the item. Remember to indicate what units you are using.

label.name: Fonds Title
label.description: This field contains the name of the fonds to which the item belongs. A 'fonds' is all of a creator’s documents written and/or accumulated and used by a particular individual, business or organization. Fonds title is composed of the name of the creator followed by the word ‘fonds’. Do not capitalize ‘fonds’.

label.name: Finding Aid
label.description: This field briefly describes any publicly accessible research aids created for this item.

label.name: Scope and Content
label.description: This field contains text to describe the document, and is used to provide descriptive information that is not in other fields.

label.name: Subject
label.description: This field contains subject terms which briefly describe the main topic of the document and answers the question “What is this document about?”

label.name: Scale
label.description: For archival maps and architectural plans: use this field to indicate the scale of the drawing or map.

label.name: History of Use
label.description: This field describes the original and subsequent use made of the object, as assessed by an authority such as a curator, archaeologist or ethnologist.

label.name: Narrative
label.description: This field contains comments, stories, or contextual information about the object. Can include associated people, organizations, places, and events in the object's history, comments from an interpretive/curatorial perspective, text of a wall label, entry from a published catalogue, etc.

label.name: Brand
label.description: This field contains the manufacturer's brand name for the object.

label.name: Serial Numbers
label.description: This field contains the unique serial number assigned to the object by the maker.

label.name: Manufacturing Technique
label.description: This field indicates the processes, methods or techniques use to manufacture the item. Add another field to enter more techniques. E.g. "carved."

label.name: Model
label.description: This field contains the manufacturer’s model name and/or number of the object.

label.name: Patents Dates and/or Numbers
label.description: This field contains any patent dates or copyright numbers associated with the object. E.g. "patent no. 12345"

label.name: Signature
label.description: This field provides details about the form and location of the artist’s or maker’s signature on the object. E.g. "signed in black ink, lower right corner, T. A. Stone"

label.name: Nationality
label.description: Enter the nationality of the entity. Multiple nationalities may be entered by adding another field. E.g. "Canadian."

label.name: Series Volume Pub
label.description: This field contains the name of the publisher of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object. E.g. "John Forbes and Son Limited."

label.name: Series Volume Title
label.description: The field contains the title or name of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object. E.g. "Pictures of East Anglia Life."

label.name: Series Volume Date
label.description: This field contains the date of the publication of the book, portfolio or series that incorporates the object.

label.name: Other Technicians
label.description: This field contains the name of the other technician, artist, or maker who contributed to the creation of the object. In the case of prints, print makers are recorded in the Artist/Maker field and the original artist in the Other Technician field.

label.name: Marks/Label
label.description: This field contains a description of the maker’s marks or labels associated with the object. For archival items, note any defunct accession/catalogue numbers, captions or remarks added to the document.

label.name: Materials
label.description: This field lists the material from which a three dimensional item, e.g. sculpture, historical object, or ethnographic artifact is made. For archival items, this field refers to the material on which the information is written. Separate multiple entries with a semicolon and a space.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Date founded
label.description: Date organization was founded.

label.name: Date incorporated
label.description: Date organization was incorporated.

label.name: Date of liquidation
label.description: Date organization was liquidated.

label.name: Brand names
label.description: Brand names under which the organization operated.

label.name: Manufacturer
label.description: Company that manufactured this artifact.

label.name: Member Institution Region
label.description: Region of member institution

label.name: Editeur de configuration de types de relation
Editeur de configuration de formulaires de recherche
